## DefaultApp.registerRoute() method

API for developers to register [AppRoutes](./foundation-shell.approute.md) lazily.

**Signature:**

```typescript
registerRoute(route: any): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  route | any | The [AppRoute](./foundation-shell.approute.md) to register. |

**Returns:**

void
